ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Is there a way to efficiently search in an ARC file?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi and thanks for the reply. Just for clarification, when you mean make an index, you are suggesting to make a manual index (like in a DB)? Something like the
